description: This modules fetches data from the Tibber Price Energy Forecast API and publishes it.

main.description: This interface is responsible for providing the price forecast data from Tibber

api_key.description: API key from Tibber developer account

update_interval.description: Update interval in minutes. Typically 60 or so.

additional_cost_per_kwh.description: Constant to add to the reported price. Usually 0.
